# log-tips

> A more versatile way of outputting logs.

## Install

You can get it on npm.

```
npm install log-tips --save
```

## Setup

###### Node (Browserify)

```js
var listen = require('log-tips')
```

###### Browser (Standalone)

```html
<script src="dist/log-tips.js </script>
```

## Usage

- 新增 常用元素类型判定 isNum, isFn, isNode, isNodeList, isObject, isString, isArray, isSvg, noop

```js
import isEffect, { isFn } from 'log-tips'
/**
 * isEffect
 *
 * @param {mixed} condition  触发条件
 * @param {string} message 触发提示
 * @param {string} [type='error'] 触发类型
 * @returns
 */
isEffect(isFn('123'), 'the element is not a function')
```
